aboutMe.about: I'm a Full-Stack Developer and a Computer Engineering Student from Buenos Aires, Argentina. I'm interested in taking part in projects that required me to work outside my comfort and knowledge set. I consider myself as a well-organised person and problem solver with high attention to detail.

skills.fastP: Fast work and load times and lag free interaction.
skills.responsiveP: My layouts will work on any device, big or small.
skills.intuitiveP: Strong preference for easy to use, intuitive UX/UI.
skills.retailerP: Organized and aesthetic websites with unique details.
